column2: A realm can hardly function at its optimum without strong contribution from the ruler's spouse. I can delegate some of the tasks of rulership to my [empowered_spouse.GetHusbandWife], thereby allowing me more time to focus on other tasks. I believe [empowered_spouse.GetSheHe] will do best to focus on...
The management of land and coffers
Plots and intrigue in the court and beyond
Matters of technological or religious import
As §Y[empowered_spouse.GetTitledFirstName]§! §Rno longer§! holds the §YEmpowered Spouse§! title, I will gain no support from [empowered_spouse.GetHerHim].
